Themes_Addon_Colors_SubTitle:
Theme colors gives you the ability to configure Pepperi's UI in a meaningful way by defining your brand or design colors.
You can select a primary and optionally a secondary color to represent your brand.
Themes_Addon_Colors_GoodToKnow1: AA compliant - evaluate your color contrast using WCAG 2.0 accessibility guidelines.
Themes_Addon_Colors_GoodToKnow2: The Strong, Regular and Weak shades are created programmatically.
Themes_Addon_PrimaryColor_SubTitle:
Primary color is the color most associated with your brand or design highlight color. You're able to configure primary color in call to action (CTA) buttons, workflow buttons, filter items etc.
If you don’t have a secondary color, your primary color will be used to accent elements.
Themes_Addon_SecondaryColor_SubTitle:
A secondary color is used to add a second brand color to the theme design. Having a secondary color is optional.
If your brand has more than one color you can add it here.
Themes_Addon_MainColor_SubTitle: This color is used for text and should have sufficient contrast to ensure readability. Therefore, its configuration is limited to dark shades only.
Themes_Addon_LinkColor_SubTitle: We use the link color in link fields and to highlight focus on buttons.
Themes_Addon_LinkColor_PreviewButton: Preview of strong system with focus
Themes_Addon_CautionColor_SubTitle:
The Caution color is used for notifications on destructive actions (such as confirm delete, exit) or to highlight errors.
For example: deleting an order or exiting a form without saving changes. This color is typically configured based on a red color tint. Therefore, its configuration is limited to shades of red.
Themes_Addon_SuccessColor_SubTitle:
The Confirmation color is used for notifications on successful actions, mainly in notification banners.
This color is typically configured based on a green color tint. Therefore its configuration is limited to shades of green.
Themes_Addon_Fonts_SubTitle: Select system font and font size.
Themes_Addon_HeadingFont_SubTitle: Font type used in large and small headings.
Themes_Addon_SystemFont_SubTitle:
This is the system wide font - changing this will affect all fonts. Want to add your own custom font? Let us know.
Coming soon: heading font.
Themes_Addon_SystemFont_PreviewText: "Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast." Lewis Carroll
Themes_Addon_FontSize_SubTitle: Select size for all font types, such as the title fonts and body fonts.
Themes_Addon_Styles_SubTitle: Currently roundness style is available for configuration. Coming soon: Spacing, Elevation (Shadows) and Icon styles.
Themes_Addon_Roundness_SubTitle: Select your preference for rounded corners.
Themes_Addon_Assign_SubTitle: Assign color and styles to different elements in your theme.
Themes_Addon_TopHeaderAssign_SubTitle: Select the color for the bar across the top of the app
Themes_Addon_StrongAssign_SubTitle:
Assign a color to the strong action buttons, such as Cart/Next/Done. Default is Primary color.
We use the strong button to emphasize actions that require an immediate or most common use case response from the user.
Themes_Addon_WeakAssign_SubTitle:
Assign a color to the weak action buttons, such as Cancel/No. Default is Secondary color.
This color is used for both the weak action buttons as well as to highlight all the fields and tab headings in the interface.
Themes_Addon_SelectWeakButtonColor_Title: Select Weak button and interface color
Themes_Addon_QsAssign_SubTitle: Assign a color and style to the Quantity Selector button in the Order Center. Default is Weak System color.
Themes_Addon_CardAssign_SubTitle: Assign styles to the card layout of items in the catalog. You can define the gutter size, which is the spacing between the fields and elements on the card. As well as the elevation (shadow) of the cards.
Themes_Addon_CardAssign_PreviewDescripti: Description of this item in a paragraph field: This is the best boat in the store. Children not included.
Themes_Addon_Branding_SubTitle: Here you can add your company logo and customize icons.
Themes_Addon_Logo_Sub_Title: Upload your company logo, prefearably transparent background
